column2: Summing up what it is  -  总括就什么来说 (zǒng kuò jiù shén me lái shuō)
It's all over  -  饱光了吧 (bǎo guāng le ba)
One last bite  -  最后一口 (zuì hòu yī kǒu)
Pieces of meatloaf  -  块肉饼 (kuài ròu bǐng)
Lots of advice  -  多多指教 (duō duō zhǐ jiào)
Take a look  -  瞌一下 (kē yī xià)
I just can't  -  就是不能 (jiù shì bù néng)
Pull the cable  -  拉大缆 (lā dà làn)
